text: Dosso Region is one of the seven regions of Niger. The regional capital is Dosso. As of the 2012 census, 2,037,713 people lived there. It has an area of . == Departments == There are five departments: * Boboye Department * Dogondoutchi Department * Dosso Department * Gaya Department * Loga Department Category:Regions of Niger
title: Dosso Region
